When a new game is created, New Save Mode determines if MOD Options are written#to the save file. Existing games containing no save data are treated as Casual games.##Tournament (or On) writes the MOD Options to the save file. Tournament save# files ignore the Disabled setting.#Casual (or Off) does not write to the save file at all. The MOD Options can be changed# between gaming sessions. Casual save files are affected by the Disabled option.#Disabled writes the default settings to the save file and uses them in lieu of the# current MOD Options.
